def f(lst):
    new = list()
    i = len(lst); i = i-1
    idx_mugc = 0
    list_9sfn = range(len(lst))
    while idx_mugc < len(list_9sfn):
        _ = list_9sfn[idx_mugc]
        if not i%2 == 0:
            new.append(lst[i])
        else:
            new.append(-lst[i])
        i -= 1
        idx_mugc = idx_mugc + 1
    return new
